column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The caring Nu Mou is worried for their familiar.
Pick full-blown lilies south of Sextuplet Shallow.
Deliver the full-blown lilies to the caring Nu Mou.
Please, mortal, I require your aid. My precious porxie has been under the weather of late, and it needs some full-blown lilies to get better.
However, I cannot leave its side to do the picking. If you would go in my stead, I promise to give you a fitting payment.
Please, pick some full-blown lilies in my stead. I would go myself, but I cannot leave my precious porxie's side.
Ah, you're back. Do you have the lilies?
You have my gratitude! Now my precious porxie can recover!
Will I feed it the lilies, you ask? After a fashion. Being an arcane entity, it cannot simply eat them.

Instead, I will infuse it with the flowers' aether. To the creature, it would be as drinking sweet nectar─a sure way to lift the spirits! My thanks again, and please accept this as fitting payment for your kindness!
